meanings.def: a date that is an exact number of years after the date of an important or special event
examples: on the anniversary of his wife’s death
The company is celebrating its 100-year anniversary this year.
Public events will be held to commemorate the anniversary of the end of the Second World War.
They held celebrations to mark the anniversary of Mozart's death.
a yearlong celebration of the 25th anniversary of his company
The context was the occasion of the 450th anniversary of his birth.
He bought her a diamond ring on their tenth wedding anniversary.
The anniversary of the founding of the charity falls in November.
the 100th anniversary edition of this classic novel
